item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, November 18, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Launch HN: Regatta Storage (YC F24) – Turn S3 into a local-like, POSIX cloud FS (219 points | 159 comments)
2. Show HN: FastGraphRAG – Better RAG using good old PageRank (112 points | 29 comments)
3. Fun facts about Google Scholar (87 points | 42 comments)
4. A BBC navigation bar component broke depending on the external monitor (152 points | 63 comments)
5. MailCatcher runs a super simple SMTP server (69 points | 31 comments)
6. Trieve (YC W24) Is Hiring a software engineer to build OpenAPI tooling ( | hide)
7. Show HN: Tips.io – A Tailwind playground with AI, page management, and theming (132 points | 31 comments)
8. Finland and Lithuania Report Severed Undersea Data Cables (125 points | 64 comments)
9. The Skyline algorithm for packing 2D rectangles (79 points | 14 comments)
10. Air traffic failure caused by two locations 3600nm apart sharing 3-letter code (90 points | 95 comments)
11. Waiting for many things at once with io_uring (37 points | 9 comments)
12. Bird brain from the age of dinosaurs reveals roots of avian intelligence (49 points | 2 comments)
13. Reactive HTML Notebooks (246 points | 39 comments)
14. Towards Nyquist Learners (21 points | 11 comments)
15. Extending the context length to 1M tokens (61 points | 87 comments)
16. AMD Now Has More Compute on the Top500 Than Nvidia (42 points | 13 comments)
17. LLaVA-O1: Let Vision Language Models Reason Step-by-Step (111 points | 22 comments)
18. A programmable FPGA SoM in the tiny microSD form factor (47 points | 8 comments)
19. Illegally logged wood from Cambodia likely ending up in U.S. homes (72 points | 37 comments)
20. Is Chrome the New IE? (2023) (121 points | 143 comments)
21. Libobscura (64 points | 4 comments)
22. Show HN: Nova JavaScript Engine (208 points | 88 comments)
23. Reverse Engineering iOS 18 Inactivity Reboot (475 points | 144 comments)
24. Against Best Practices (172 points | 131 comments)
25. Show HN: Documind – Open-source AI tool to turn documents into structured data (129 points | 38 comments)
26. The tragedy of running an old Node project (72 points | 83 comments)
27. Bhutan, after prioritizing happiness, now faces an existential crisis (204 points | 256 comments)
28. Farmers' Suicide in the United States (23 points | 5 comments)
29. Fortran II Hypersource (59 points | 7 comments)
30. I was banned from the hCaptcha accessibility account for not being blind (2023) (290 points | 202 comments)
